Thaumaturgy 4

Auspex
Ritual
A2
spell id [id]: 1000
effect number [effect_number]: 48
damage [damage]: 1
range [provrange]: 2 provinces
number of effects [nreff]: 1
gems required [gemcost]: 2A
Remote Site Search:A
Only target friendly provinces :1
Cannot trace range through seas :1
Cannot target geo mask : (Sea)
The caster listens to the winds and observes the flight of birds. The winds will carry legends of magical places and ancient storms. If the winds are correctly interpreted, the caster gains knowledge of sites of Air power in a distant province. This spell cannot be cast at an enemy province.
